channel.title: I need an update program for my client
channel.description: hey i need an update program that lets me update my client so that the other players do not have to re download the whole client again i have my own server and client ofcourse its a 317 client whit custom items and when i add a custom item the other players on my server cant c the item and if they whant to c the item they need to redownload the whole client i just whant to know if there is a program that lets me do that specific ting sorry for my mistakes im ducth thnx already

item.title: I need an update program for my client
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“shagrath666, post:3, topic:354189”]yea thats my problem im new XD but do you maby know anyone who can help me whit that cuz i can code a lil but not as good as a pro ofcource[/quote]I actually have one for my new 508 (unreleased, unused) but I wont be writing a tutorial any time soon on it. But I doubt any one else that does know how would take the time to write it out for just one person, sorry

There aren’t many RSPS that have these, so I’d try to learn java and write one yourself.

Read full topic

item.source: I need an update program for my client

item.title: I need an update program for my client
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t think anyone has written a tutorial about it here. What you want to do is write an update server, that sends any updated client files to the client if it determines the client to be out of date. Chances are, you being new, you wont be able to do this, but I wish you good luck.

Read full topic
